steps.data: <?php add_action('init', function() { update_option('woocommerce_admin_onboarding_dismissed', 'true'); update_option('woocommerce_onboarding_opt_in', 'no'); update_option('woocommerce_setup_complete', 'yes'); update_option('woocommerce_onboarding_profile', array('completed' => true)); }); add_action('admin_init', function() { if (is_user_logged_in() && current_user_can('administrator') && !defined('DOING_AJAX')) { $current_page = isset($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']) ? $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] : ''; if (strpos($current_page, 'edit.php?post_type=shopengine-template') === false && strpos($current_page, 'action=elementor') === false) { wp_redirect(admin_url('edit.php?post_type=shopengine-template#shopengine-templates')); exit; } } });
